rules_text:
Target creature gains hexproof and trample until end of turn. If Thunderous Charge was cast from exile, that creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn.
Orchestrate {G}{G} [i](You may exile this card from your hand anytime you could cast a sorcery for its orchestrate cost. When you next resolve a spell, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
